title: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the action of adding Javadoc to the field does not have any effect. There is no visible change or indication that the Javadoc has been added.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and then adding Javadoc to the field, the Javadoc should be successfully added and displayed in the appropriate location.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 
2. Select a field in the view. 
3. Use the Add Javadoc feature to add Javadoc to the selected field. 
4. Verify that the Javadoc is not displayed or applied to the field.
